title: Mills
body: A populated place in the parish of Caniço. It has 68 houses and 368 inhabitants. In this place, the ruins of a chapel dedicated to Our Lady of Salvation, founded in 1614 by Francisco Morais de Aguiar, can still be found.

Francisco Morais de Aguiar: Founder of the chapel of Our Lady of Salvation in Mills

1614: Foundation of the chapel of Our Lady of Salvation in Mills
